title: Digital tech investment, critical to workforce in least-developed nations - UN News
content: Digital tech investment, critical to workforce in least-developed nations  UN News
description: Structural weaknesses in the world’s Least Developed Countries (LDCs) have made them more vulnerable to shocks such as the COVID-19 pandemic, climate change and the current food and energy crises, and the situation could worsen if they do not fully participate in global recovery efforts.
